title: Fruit Party
description: Fruit Party is the ultimate basket-dropping challenge! Merge and grow your fruits by dropping them into a basket, combining identical ones to create bigger, juicier fruits, and earning high scores. Every successful merge grants coins for upgrades, but be careful, if your basket overflows, itâ€™s game over! Use power-ups like free upgrades and basket shakes to keep the game going. Grow your fruit empire and reach a high score!
